name: brandr-platform
description: Brandr Platform - Django Backend + React Frontend

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source ../venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver 8000
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
